pkgmetadata.longdescription: The flat assembler g (abbreviated to fasmg) is a new assembly engine designed as a successor of the one used by flat assembler 1. Instead of having a built-in support for x86 instructions, it implements them through additional packages and in the same way it can be adapted to assemble for different architectures and purposes.

use.flag: Build using system dev-lang/fasm or dev-lang/fasmg
